thread.title: Book of Condolence opened for Oldham MP
thread.title_full: Book of Condolence opened for Oldham MP | Granada - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Book of Condolence opened for Oldham MP
text:
The veteran Labour MP for Oldham West and Royton died aged 75 Credit: PA Oldham Council will open a Book of Condolence today for the late MP Michael Meacher.
The 75 year old who was an Honorary Freeman of the Borough and MP for Oldham West and Royton died after a short illness. He had been an MP since 1970.
A Book of Condolence will be placed at the Civic Entrance at Oldham Council and at Royton Town Hall during normal opening hours.
People can also pay tribute at an online Book of Condolence . The Borough Flag at Oldham Civic Centre will fly at half-mast on the day of the funeral.
Last updated Thu 22 Oct 2015 Read more 1 update Oldham and Labour MP Michael Meacher has died aged 75 Politics Oldham Michael Meacher Greater Manchester
